name: Play a Game.exe
description:
PLAY A GAME.EXE

You come home after a hard day and run Play_a_Game.exe to relax...

DO NOT DO THIS WAY IT WILL TURN  YOUR LIFE IN HELL

I won't write much, but remember: U HAVE BEEN WARNED! All that is in game will try to kill you. Even ceiling.

The game was made in 3 days for GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½
